name: Ultramom
description:
A small puzzle-platformer created for Mini Ludum-Dare 60, which people have found very hard. The theme is "10 seconds" from Ludum Dare 27. I have to admit level 1 is pretty finicky. I much prefer levels 2 and 3.

You can view the game's page on the Ludum Dare site here.

Feel free to leave comments. Although I've made this game a while ago, I'm still interested in reading your thoughts on it !
